attributes.action: create family values by changing childcare from an aid to get parents back to work, to an aid to stay home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: childcare should be paid to parents to stay home and bring up the children they so wanted, not to encourage them back into work. with a good home environment both the children and the community will benefit from a good stable family home and hopefully reduce in crime going forward.
